The State affects on the ratizen's actions. Due to the state, some actions could be restricted and instead other actions might be performed.
The Status Effects are gained through various aspects, and they affect on the ratizen's abilities.
The Food can be restored by food consumption. ratizens in hunger will lose this points, and if last too long, they will die of starvation.
The Joy can be restored by using certain service facilities. ratizens who could not enjoy enough will lose this points, and if last too long, they will fall into boredom.
The Hygiene can be restored by using certain service facilities. ratizens who did not clean themselves will lost this points, and if last too long, they will get sick.

The Necessity can be charged up by consuming necessities. Each of the necessities gives an useful effect to the ratizen. The ratizens with more fullfiled necessities has higher chance to get in the upper classes, and will feel more satisfied.
Income satisfaction depends on the average of recent earnings of the ratizen. As the ratizen gets relatively higher income, the higher satisfaction will be followed.
Tax compliance depends on the average of recently taxed amount of the ratizen. As the ratizen pays less amount of tax, the higher compliance will be followed.
The ratizen got bankrupt! How could someone use up all the money until this point?
The ratizen got assigned to a bed.
Due to the stacked damage, or because of status already had, the ratizen died.
The ratizen newly arrived to the city.
The ratizen got dismissed from the placed workspace.
The ratizen got into Poor Class due to the changes in wealth or Necessity sufficiency.
The ratizen got into Middle Class due to the changes in wealth or Necessity sufficiency.
The ratizen got into High Class due to the changes in wealth or Necessity sufficiency.
The ratizen got assigned to the workplace.
The ratizen went on strike because of a lack of happiness.
The ratizen planned to migrate because of a lack of happiness.
The ratizen revolted because of a lack of happiness.
The ratizen got wounded because of severe damage.
The ratizen got dismissed from the bed.
The ratizen committed crime.
The ratizen got imprisoned.
Detailed information of a ratizen's income.
Unpaid tax charged to the ratizen. This can be collected by using [Interaction] when the ratizen is in the aimed area.
Impose tax on ratizen with certain standard every certain period of time.
Strength is one of the most important basic abilities to survive in the wild. Strong ratizens can transport more resources at once, and deal more damage to the opponents.
Dexterity is a helpful ability to move and act agile. Dexterous ratizens can produce delicate resources, offer greater quality of services, and move faster.

Intelligence is a helpful ability when there is a need of brilliant ideas. Intelligent ratizens gain experience more quickly than others, and are able to work more efficiently on many city-needed jobs.
Select filters to apply visible effects.
This is fine... to live I guess.
Everything is gonna be okay.
The Happiness shows ratizen's welfare level. Happier ratizens will work with better quality than the other. When too low, they will struggle actively to change the situation.

The Stamina shows the energy of the ratizen for actions. Ratizens with low stamina will go to sleep. If they could not get enough rest in time, they might faint. Sleeping in beds will charge up stamina faster.
The ratizens with low health point will faint, and when it reaches 0, they die.
The ratizens with higher attack power deal more damages on enemies with each attacks.
The ratizens with higher attack speed can attack more in a same time.
The ratizens with higher moving speed can move faster in a same time.
The ratizens with higher working speed can work more in a same time.
The ratizens with higher carrying capacity can carry more at once.
The ratizens with higher experience bonus gets more experience with the same work.

Ah, this is the golden plains. Build a peaceful kingdom on a land free of threats, plenty of food, abundant resources, and harmonious ratizens without quarrels.
A right place to settle down. There are problems, but where does a place not have any? There is enough land for a decent leader to build a decent kingdom.

A land filled with plagues, and the city will be filled with disgruntled ratizens. Yes, the world is full of miseries. Still, one might build a kingdom on this godforsaken land, and prove oneself as the rightful leader.
An exchange rate ticket that is drawn every day. When picked, it affects the value of Dar as written.
Dar value rises greatly.
Dar value rises.
Dar value stabilizes.
Dar value falls.
Dar value falls greatly.
<sprite name=FS_Prosperity>Prosperity has reached to the maximum level.
Economic score is strongly related to the amount of currency circulating in the state. Try to maintain enough monetary values fits to the prosperity level of the city to get higher economic score.

Infrastructure score is strongly related to the number of structures built in the city. Try building many production structures and service structures, and decorate the city to get higher infrastructure score.

Ratizen score is strongly related to the classes of the inhabitants in the city. Try distributing enough necessities and wealth to the ratizens to make them get into higher classes to get higher ratizen score.

Still functional even when submerged in water.
I am not here to starve to death!
So boring... Will anything ever happen?
Eww, I feel sticky. I need to wash!
I want to be rich. Is that even possible?
Who is ruling, a thief? Why are they taking so much?
Oh my, I'm going to die. Everything I hate keeps happening.
It was a terrible experience.
This is what it means to live to eat!
Ah, this enjoyable life! It's worth paying for!
Look at my fur, I'm so shiny! I love this clean city!
Ah, life is fulfilling enough to afford such luxury. What should I buy today?
If the things just go on like this, I'd be the richest soon enough!
The best welfare is not having my things taken away, says I, the Rat!
Oh my, I love my job so much. Everything I want keeps happening!
It was the best experience!
I doubt the authorities have any idea.
It's a decent place to live, I suppose.
Ahh. I love this city so much.

Do you want to cancel the mission?
Do you want to start the mission?
Surveying the area.
Proceeding may decrease the relations with the city([COUNTRYNAME]) occupying this area. Do you still want to continue?
Do you want to stop the exploration? Consumed resources will not be recovered.
Do you want to stop the survey? Consumed resources will not be recovered.
This area is not occupied by anyone.
Provide economic support to increase <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations and <sprite name=FS_Prosperity>Prosperity.
"It's nothing much, but keep it."
Publicly condemn the target city to decrease <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations. The <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations with other cities that are hostile to the target city will increase.
"This is why others treat you that way."

Use <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations to request resources or wealth. The success rate and required relations will vary depending on the <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations and <sprite name=FS_Prosperity>Prosperity of the target city.
"We're family now, so you can help us, right?"
Demand tribute from the target city. Each time the tribute is paid, <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations with the target city decrease.
"Peace can be bought with enough money."
When a trade route is opened, resources can be traded with the target city through the Trading Center. The items available for trade change every season.
"Let's build the future together through trade."
When a trade route is closed, all ongoing trades with the target are halted.
"You don't care about the future anymore, do you?"
If an alliance is formed, resources can be obtained through support requests, and military assistance can be received for defense and invasion.
"Ideology is thicker than blood. Let's become a new family."
If the alliance is dissolved, support requests and military assistance will no longer be possible.
"Profit might be thicker than ideology."
When a declaration of war is made, a state of hostility ensues, and all agreements are nullified.

Array.Key: Dip declaration of war info scr
Array.Value: "In the end, history is written in blood."
Relations return to a neutral state upon a peace agreement.
"Violence is not needed in the coming future."
Relations return to a neutral state upon the liberation of a vassal state.
I'm sorry for everything, and I look forward to working with you in the future.
Mystical Vault of the Ancient
"Behold, holder of the vault. The more you give up, the more shall be added. Fill this place to the brim."
Fill the vault.
Ignore it.
Currently, [A] amount of gold is accumulated. Do you want to take the money back?
Leave it as is.
Take all the golds out.
Our headquarters has been destroyed.
The complete ancient power has collapsed the space.
Gifts can be exchanged, or trade routes can be opened with other cities. War can also be a means of diplomacy.
Hire soldiers to perform defensive activities at the campsite.
Wandering mercenaries. They defend a stronghold for money.
The flow of time can be adjusted while sleeping.
Destroy enemy headquarters
Eliminate all enemies
Maintain zero allied casualties
The Ratizens gradually get anxious.
+1 Attack power per [A] in Savings
This city has not yet been discovered.
Feeling anxious as the lizards' territory expands.
Due to class restrictions, there are no Ratizens in the city who can consume.
Mining and gathering efficiency increased by [A]%.
An effect from the list of effects is randomly applied.
Additional damage on the third hit of a combo attack
Increases the chance to deal 200% damage by [A]%.
Attack speed increases by [A]%.
New effects can be granted to equipment through reforging.
Start reforging the equipment?
Level 1 reforging can be performed at the Royal Forge.
Level 2 reforging can be performed at the Hell Forge in the Volcanic Range.
I don't have enough money to live...
What crime should I commit next?
No one will be able to catch me.
Protected by the powerful magic of the ancient shaman.
The only foods available are ones I can't afford at my class level. Could you change the law?
There are many resources we can't purchase due to class restrictions, and the Ratizens are starving. How about drafting a new law?
I'm starving to death...
Applies status effects to targets within the range.
New messages arrive every day at 00:00.
Do you want to abandon the mission?
You can limit the storage quantity for individual resources.
Trade has been suspended due to diplomatic issues.
Check diplomatic messages
Do you want to proceed with this mission?
You can have up to one diplomatic mission active at a time.
Do you want to summon the Ratizen?
Recently summoned a Ratizen, so it cannot be used now.
These are resources that the vassal provides to the suzerain. Relations decrease when a tribute contract is signed.
Set the quantity of resources to be tributed each period. The higher the prosperity of the vassal, the more can be demanded at once.
Set the tribute period. The period is proportional to the distance from the counterpart city. The contract ends when the expiration date is reached.
Select the storage to receive the tributes.

Array.Key: Dip withdraw tribute resource info scr
Array.Value: We don't have to offer more?
Terminate the resource tribute contract. Recover a portion of the relations spent.
Do you want to proceed with the drafted agreement?
We'll have nothing left if you do this!

Pay <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations. Every <color=#EA6B48>last day of the season</color> that relations are paid, gain <sprite name=FS_Gold>Pia proportional to the vassal's <sprite name=FS_Prosperity>Prosperity.

If relations are sufficient, the tribute contract will be renewed after the tribute payment. When the tribute contract is terminated, the consumed relations are refunded.

Array.Key: Dip withdraw taxes tribute info scr
Array.Value: Now we can breathe!
No longer consume relations to collect taxes.
Do you want to relocate the Ratizen? This member will not return to [COUNTRYNAME].
"When money doesn't solve the problem, consider if there isn't enough money."
Provide economic benefits to the ringleader of the rebellion to quell it. Consumes <sprite name=FS_Gold>Pia and restores <sprite name=FS_Relations>Relations.
Invade the target city and plunder up to [N] types of loot.
Invade the target city and make it a <sprite name=FS_Dependency>vassal state.

The soldiers will be automatically deployed to the War Banner. Do you want to proceed?

When a Ratizen dies, their Wealth is transferred to the Savings.

Select and consume a royal dish.
Pia currently held by the city. If Pia is insufficient, Ratizens will not receive compensation for their labor, decreasing happiness.
Average happiness level of all Ratizens. Ratizens with low happiness are more likely to commit crimes or start rebellions.
Total Food held by the city. Food is a vital resource directly connected to the survival of Ratizens.
Research points required to study new structures. Can be obtained by storing new resources or producing them in the research lab.
Number of Ratizens in the city. The population limit can be increased through prosperity level growth and milestones.
Current prosperity points and the prosperity points needed to reach the next stage.
The effects of royal dishes may vary depending on the order in which they are consumed.

A plate where dishes can be placed. Some dishes enhance the effects of the dish placed on the next plate.

The effect received from the selected milestone.
